inputs.name: backupType
inputs.label: Backup Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the backup type you want to perform.

inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the server name as ServerName or ServerName\Instance

inputs.name: databaseName
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the database you want to backup. If database name includes spaces, enclose it in square brackets []

inputs.name: backupFile
inputs.label: Backup file name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the file name (including full path) of the backup file.

inputs.name: withInit
inputs.label: Overwrite backup file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Controls whether the backup operation appends to or overwrites the existing backup sets on the backup media

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: SQL Server Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Login using SQL Authentication. Otherwise uses the login the build agent service runs under

inputs.name: userPassword

inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for SQL Authenication. You should use a secret variable here.
